entry.title: andyhub1991/chrome_tab_grouper: __Recent Tabs Grouper__ is a Chrome extension that helps power users manager browser clutter by grouping open tabs by domain and displaying the most recently accessed tabs. It features collapsible, tab groups, last activity timestamps, and one-click tab closing - all in a lightweight popup UI.
entry.content: __Recent Tabs Grouper__ is a Chrome extension that helps power users manager browser clutter by grouping open tabs by domain and displaying the most recently accessed tabs. It features collapsible, tab groups, last activity timestamps, and one-click tab closing - all in a lightweight popup UI.

entry.title: diesel-core/diesel: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
entry.content: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
